entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 10:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
